name: Stanford Adventures
description:
Welcome to Stanford Adventures!

This is a blatant ripoff of Bookworm Adventures, except this time, there's absolutely no storyline or point in besting your enemies! Created during CS106B at Stanford University.

Use your mouse to click on tiles and spell words. Then click enter to submit a word. Longer words do more damage to the enemy. Can you survive three waves of the Stanford Logo? Probably. Can you do it without losing a ton of health? Probably not. Good luck!
